globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; font-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; form-action 'self'; upgrade-insecure-requests
globalHeaders.permissions-policy: geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=(), payment=(), usb=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=(), accelerometer=(), fullscreen=(), autoplay=(), encrypted-media=(), picture-in-picture=()
